text: @ddale8 So the world now revolves not around the Sun but around Coronavirus. Right? Just 1 disease. No more cancer diabetes Etc.  no more Wars Afghanistan Isis Etc. no more crimes. yeah no more bad people. I guess bad people got scared too. No more rapists Etc. and no more God etcetera
